'''''City of Winds and Idylls''''' is the second [[Mondstadt]] Chapter [[soundtrack]] album and the ''[[Genshin Impact]]'' Release Commemorative OST.<ref>Twitter: [https://twitter.com/GenshinImpact/status/1316952005848551427 Post OST Release]</ref>

It features a total of 63 tracks composed by [[w:c:mihoyo:Chen Zhiyi|Yu-Peng Chen]] of [[HOYO-MiX]]. The album is divided by three discs: ''City of Winds and Idylls'', ''The Horizon of Dandelion'', and ''Saga of the West Wind''.

The album was released on Spotify and Apple Music on September 28, 2020. The proper release onto the official YouTube channel occurred on November 2, 2020.<ref>Twitter: [https://twitter.com/GenshinImpact/status/1323484717589491712 YouTube Release Announcement]</ref> The [[City of Winds and Idylls (CD Set)|original soundtrack CD set version]] of the album was released on August 4, 2021.
